pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 27, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, April 27, 2017:

Gray, Saskatchewan

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Lewis Land Limited Farm.

Gray Recreation Centre
Corner of Route 306 and King Street
Gray, Saskatchewan

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should present themselves at the Gray Recreation Centre no later than 7:45 a.m.
  • Media will have opportunity to set up ahead of media availability and will be escorted to the farm for the photo opportunity.
  • Boots and warm apparel are recommended.

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Gray Recreation Centre
Corner of Route 306 and King Street
Gray, Saskatchewan

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:45 a.m.


Regina, Saskatchewan

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit students at Miller Comprehensive Catholic High School.

Miller Comprehensive Catholic High School
1027 College Avenue
Regina, Saskatchewan

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for visit with students
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:30 p.m. and must sign in at the main entrance

Media appearances

An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Saskatchewan Agriculture Today with Jim Smalley on 620 CKRM between 12:30 and 1:00 p.m.


Note: all times local
